name: Agent 86
description:
Follow the navigation arrow to reach the flag, grab it  then return to base without being detected by the guards.

إتبع السهم حتى تصل للعلم ، التقط العلم ثم عد الى القاعدة  بدون ان يكتشف الحراس.

Controls:

WSAD, or Arrow keys

Developed by:

Mohamed Elwy

3D model & animation:

https://www.mixamo.com/

Music and SFX: 

https://www.bensound.com/

https://freesound.org

https://3dtextures.me/
